attributes.action: use non-slip road paint for markings and lines, making the road safer for motorcycles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the motorcycle theory test there are many questions noting how slippy road markings (Bus/white lines) are in the rain. Simply using non-slip road paint would cut the risk and makes perfect sense.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "use non-slip road paint for markings and lines, making the road safer for motorcycles."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14813.asp

Prime Minister's Office
